settings.question: What Is Whole Body Health?
settings.answer:
Whole Body Health is a complete 360-view of one’s health. It combines physical, mental, emotional, social and spiritual factors in your ability to thrive rather than merely survive. 

Whole body wellness is essential to help prevent disease, reduce the risk of chronic and acute injuries, successfully treat existing conditions and become a more productive and happier person.

settings.question: How does targeting Whole Body Health & Circadian Rhythm support my overall well-being & healthy aging?
settings.answer:
Great Question!

In our fast-paced world, factors like stress, traveling, environmental changes, and unhealthy diets can impact our overall well-being and how we age. Embracing whole body health and aligning with our natural circadian rhythms is crucial for a vibrant and balanced life.

Imagine your body as a thriving, interconnected ecosystem made up of trillions of enzymes, microorganisms, and fungi. Nourishing this complex network with essential nutrients, beneficial bacteria, digestive enzymes, and natural adaptogens promotes comprehensive health and well-being from within.

By aligning your body's internal ecosystem with your circadian rhythms, you promote holistic wellness that lays the foundation for a strong, resilient, and balanced life.

settings.question: What are terpenes, and how do they enhance vitamin gummies?
settings.answer: Terpenes are aromatic compounds found in plants that can have various health benefits. When added to vitamin gummies, terpenes can enhance their flavor, aroma, elevated mood and potential health benefits.

settings.question: Are your vitamin gummies vegan-friendly?
settings.answer:
Yes! Our vitamin gummies are made with natural fruit pectin instead of the animal products used to make gelatin.

Furthermore our ingredients are organically-sourced, GMO Free, Soy and Dairy Free.

settings.question: What Are Probiotic Fiber Gummies?
settings.answer:
Probiotics are specific strains of live bacteria chosen for their immense health benefits to the body. These beneficial microbes can be added to a wide range of foods and taken as dietary supplements.

Although they are both essential for the good health of the immune system, probiotics should not be mistaken for a prebiotic fiber blend, which is a non-digestible supplement taken as a source of food for the growth of essential gut microbiome colony-forming units.

One such food-bacteria combination is the addition of probiotics to gummy bear candies to produce probiotic gummies.

These adult probiotic gummies are great for guarding the body against a host of ailments associated with digestive and cognitive health.

settings.question: What is the best way to take my ActiveCare gummies?
settings.answer:
We recommend you take one gummy either at or around the time of a meal or snack to ensure optimal absorption. By taking the gummies with some food containing fat, your body can naturally support the absorption of essential fat-soluble vitamins in our product, allowing you to enjoy maximum benefits; however, it is not mandatory. 

It's essential to follow the recommended dosage and only exceed it if your healthcare practitioner advises. 

Taking more than the recommended dosage can result in adverse effects, including potential toxicity.

It is important to consult with your healthcare professional prior to use if you are taking any medications, have any medical conditions or are allergic to any of the listed ingredients.

settings.question: Are ActiveCare gummies right for me?
settings.answer:
People looking to support their nutritional needs and fill any gaps in their diets, vital macro and micro nutrient absorption, elevated mood, restorative sleep patterns, support their whole body health and wellbeing would find ActiveCare gummies ideal. 

This is true for people who might experience deficiencies because of dietary choices (like vegetarianism or veganism), for those who have intense training programs, work-life stresses or for frequent travelers who have irregular meals.

settings.question: What is your money-back guarantee and return policy?
settings.answer:
It’s important to us that our customers are happy, so your purchase is covered by our incredible 30 day money-back guarantee.

If you’re not 100% satisfied, you can contact us within 30 days of your first order to initiate the process of receiving a refund for your original order.
